group-apps.tooltip: Group the open app instances into single icon

show-pinned.tooltip: Show the pinned apps or just show the open windows

enable-hover-peek.tooltip: Group the open app instances into single icon

onclick-thumbnails.tooltip: Open the thumbnails on click, if there is more than 1 windows open.

hover-peek-time.tooltip: The animation time for the windows on hover peek

hover-peek-opacity.tooltip: Opacity of the windows on peek.

thumbnail-size.tooltip: Opacity of the windows on peek.

sort-thumbnails.tooltip: opened: sort by first opened, focused: sort by last focused

number-display.tooltip: normal: display window number, smart: display window number if more than one window, none: don't display number, all: display window number for favorites too

title-display.tooltip: focused: show focused window title, title: display the window title, app: diplay app name, none: don't display anything
